title: Can't find my club?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Ever since the new client I can't get into my club. It says I can make a new one but It doesn't show that I own one already. I cant get reinvited because I didn't promote anyone to officer. A [screenshot provided by someone still in the club still shows me as the owner](https://gyazo.com/af0246ce192e30e192bb794bb750c032) so I don't know what's happening.  Any help would be appreciated, thanks!

replies.body:
Ah, yeah there were a few different lingering issues with Clubs after the re-enable. If you reach out in a [**support ticket,**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we can work together to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
